overview: Live in New York, NY Roseland Ballroom (11/24/1998). This was the final (of five) small club shows that Metallica played in November 1998 to promote the 2-disc covers album, 'Garage, Inc'. It was broadcast live by MTV.  01 - Creeping Death Jam  02 - Die Die My Darling  03 - Blitzkrieg  04 - Small Hours  05 - The Prince  06 - Sabbra Cadabra  07 - Whiskey In The Jar  08 - Stone Cold Crazy  09 - Mercyful Fate  10 - Turn The Page  11 - Am I Evil?  12 - So What!!  13 - ....And Justice For All Jam  14 - Killing Time  15 - The Wait  16 - Last Caress/Green Hell  17 - Breadfan  18 - Overkill
title: Metallica: Live Covers
